post.content:
The main difference is EPiServer 6 is web forms only, and I believe you have a choice between web forms or MVC with 7.

EPiServer 7 supports regular updates, nuget and Visual Studio integration and a more modern editorial interface.

In my opinion, EPiServer 6 is still a stable platform and useful for those running older software or legacy systems. All versions are built on the ASP.NET framework which has proven itself as a stable, secure platform for many years.
